entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Text present in the image loses quality when the image view is resized #11772
  • EvaluateJavaScriptAsync null reference if undefined returned on Android #11770
  • iOS Thickness should be multiple to 2 #11769
  • IsEnabled currently unsettable on MenuFlyoutItem and MenuSubFlyoutItem #11767
    Backlog
  • DisplayAlert not working on MacCatalyst and UWP #11766
    Backlog
  • ScrollView doesn't work in the Shell Flyout Header #11764
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Review setting IsAccessibilityElement to true scenarios #11762
    Backlog
  • Problem Geocoding Address #11756
  • Button.ContentLayout="Right, xx" does not work inside of an HorizontalStackLayout #11755
  • Navigation after file share intent is not working #11754
    Backlog
  • No iPhone simulators show in vs for mac stable version #11753
  • Could not deploy iOS app from VS for Mac stable version #11752
  • Scaling of root VisualElement is ignored #11751
    Backlog
  • Height Request of Frame not working in Android #11750
  • Image does not load a specific URI only on Android and UWP platform. #11749
    Backlog
  • Carousel view selection and scrolling is not working perfectly in any platform. #11748
    Backlog
  • iOS Radio Button displays with same black coloring in Dark Mode #11747
  • Have easy way to set initial BlazorWebView URL #11746
    8.0-preview1

Closed

  • [Windows] Shell FlyoutIcon doesn't change the hamburger Icon for Flyout #7667
  • Shell: Flyout menu items are missing in MAUI windows #9103
  • PushModalAsync ignored at application startup #11745
    Backlog
  • PushModalAsync method does not respond in OnAppearing method #7478
  • Is `AppDomain.CurrentDomain.ProcessExit` supposed to work on macOS (maccatalyst)? #11676
  • TapGestureRecognizer on label in default ControlStyle not working #11705
  • Disabling a MenuBarItem doesn't stop its sub-items from appearing when clicked #11602
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] Accessible RadioButton #1002
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Stacklayout leaves layout space for items whose IsVisible=false #11678
    Backlog
  • Element.ChildRemoved event has wrong sender #11720
    Backlog
  • [MAUI-Windows] Unhandled layout cycle exception occurs when setting "IsVisible = False" inside FlexLayout #9377
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Windows] TabbedPage inside NavigationPage TopBar fighting #8011
  • [Android] Toolbar item icon and text disappears when reopening from recent applications. #11552
  • Adding 365 Views in a Grid takes forever #7916
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add API changes doc #11768
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [net8.0] Run dotnet format #11761
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [main] Update PublicAPI.Shipped.txt files #11760
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Update PublicAPI.Shipped.txt files #11759
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net6.0] Fix up the Shipped/Unshipped APIs #11758
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Build] Add maestro-changelog workflow action #11757
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [Windows] Correctly disable MenuBarItems #11695
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, control-menubar
  • Fix Element.ChildRemoved event sender #11741
    community ✨
  • Ensure invisible views don't get rows/columns when generating AndExpand layouts #11712
  • [WinUI] Fix RefreshView crash if no content is specified #11735
  • [7.0-sr1] Fix up the Shipped/Unshipped APIs #11737
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [6.0-sr8] Fix up the Shipped/Unshipped APIs #11732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Don't set editor action to handled #11739
    area/controls 🎮

Updated

  • Add `FrameRenderer` to all our existing tests and then resolve found issues #10751
  • Only add PointerGesture if PointerOver VisualState exists #11591
    area/gestures
  • [Android] Invalidate Button background drawable if size changes #11604
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Allow Button.ImageSource to be updated on Android, iOS and macOS #11008
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix shadows size in clipped views #11603
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Correctly render ContentPage brushes background #11721
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #11597
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • [windows] ReadyToRun packages ahead of time #11744
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️
  • Update WebAuthenticator to support custom ResponseDecoder (#11641) #11710
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Enable parallel builds back #10420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
